name: addKmipServer
description: Add the specified KMIP server to the set of active KMIP servers.

id.description: ID assigned to a Rubrik cluster. Use *me* to refer to the Rubrik cluster that is hosting the current API session.

body.description: Object containing the configuration details for a KMIP server.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
